law.catch_line: Whenever a security guard is in uniform, the security guard may wear a badge that is:...

text.section:
Whenever a security guard is in uniform, the security guard may wear a badge that is:
of a design approved by the Secretary; and
issued by the licensed security guard agency that employs the security guard.
Whenever a security guard is in uniform, the security guard shall clearly display and wear the clearance card issued by the Secretary which identifies the security guard.
